title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Inside Probellum
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Inside Probellum
description:
This week Chris talks with the former CEO of Golden Boy Promotions and the current President of Probellum, Richard Schaefer. Richard dives into exactly what Probellum is, his role, and what we should come to expect from the boxing company. Later, Chris talks with Josh Taylor about his upcoming fight with Jack Catterall. Finally, Chris helps you win some money with his top picks for this weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
